headline: California American Water Proudly Recognizes Partnership with The Greater Sacramento Urban League
summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif., December 09, 2024--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a 501(c)(3) organization established by American Water, the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., and California American Water, announced today that The Greater Sacramento Urban League (GSUL) has received a $20,000 commitment as part of a larger Foundation Corporate Strategic grant. Funding will enhance workforce development initiatives that help close the equality gap for African Amer

headline: American Water Recognized as One of the Forbes 2025 Most Trusted Companies in America
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., December 09, 2024--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., today announced it has been recognized on Forbes’ inaugural list of the Most Trusted Companies in America 2025.
